publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-467.1 Jim Mather: Creating an Enterprise Culture in Scotland's Schoolsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-467) in the name of Mr Jim Wallace, leave out from "take" to end and insert "have full rewarding lives and the entrepreneurial spirit required to take up and create rewarding options in a new and increasingly competitive Scotland, which has full control of its own economy."
